title: A post about boycotting the game on the hot page just got deleted
body:
People in the comments were wondering whether it would be impactful or not to not play on the 10th anniversary in october...

The thread got deleted...

You have your answer y'all: even talking about protesting against Riot's insatiable greed and will to destroy the playability of the game is worth getting deleted. Whether it got deleted by Riot employee's or the boards' """volunteers""", this I don't know, but what I know is that I'm certainly not playing the 27th October, and so should you because they certainly don't want us to know about any boycotting intent, and that alone gives us all a reason to do it.

It's simple and everyone can do it. You have nothing to lose but a lot to gain from it, from free time to a slap on Riot's ass
